flawed_nl_solution:
He had 8/2=<<8/2=4>>4 left after giving some puppies away
He then keeps one so he sells 4-1=<<4-1=3>>3 puppies
That means he made 3*600=$<<3*600=18000>>18000
So his profit was 18000-300=$<<18000-300=17700>>17700
#### 17700

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1800, not 18000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
